column4: okay so I am trying to restore the following file: /lib/modules/2.6.22-14-generic/kernel/drivers/net/wireless/iwl3945.ko but no package seems to contain it!!!!! Any ideas
it is probably in package linux-2.6.22-14-modules or something
try apt-cache search linux module and then apt-get --reinstall install <thepackage>
no it returns nothing, dkpg -S returns nothing and I've manually looked through all the kernel packages in Synaptic and non of them seem to list it
